titleStmt.title: Some meditations on the history recorded in the first fourteen chapters of Exodus, in meeter
titleStmt.author: Morton, Charles, 1627-1698.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Morton by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"An account, under the guise of the Exodus from Egypt, of the migration of the Puritans to New England"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
